subject: Mascots
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: FORT LEE, N.J., March 24 (AP) — A University of North Carolina student who suits up as the college’s Rameses mascot remained in critical condition Saturday after being hit by a sport utility vehicle near his hotel a day earlier.
snippet: FORT LEE, N.J., March 24 (AP) — A University of North Carolina student who suits up as the college’s Rameses mascot remained in critical condition Saturday after being hit by a sport utility vehicle near his hotel a day earlier.
